flawed_nl_solution:
Shay is 6 + 13 = <<6+13=19>>19 years old.
James is 19 + 5 = <<19+5=24>>24 years old.
Thomas will be 24 in 24 - 6 = <<24-6=81>>81 years.
James will be 24 + 81 = <<24+81=105>>105 years old.
#### 105

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 18, not 81. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
